children.text: saudhe tuṅge saha dayitayā ko 'pi saṅkrīḍamānaḥ
kṣetre cāsmin sakalavipadāṃ bhañjane pañca māsān
ākarṇyemāṃ punariti tathā saiṣa cakre nivāsaṃ
atrāyāhi priyasakha nanu svāgataṃ paśya pārśve
antastoṣaṃ mama vitanuṣe hanta jāne bhavantaṃ
vācālaṃ mā parabhṛta kṛthā māṃ priyāviprayuktaṃ
tvaṃ cāpaśyan bata virahiṇāṃ yena jānāsi tāpam
tāvatkālaṃ tava ca hṛdayaṃ tāntimetīti śaṅke
sandeśaṃ me naya khagapate sādhaya bhrātṛkṛtyaṃ
cūte cūte kusumakalikāṃ tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sametaṃ
prāyo bhāvī kṣaṇamiva sakhe gacchataste vilambaḥ
sā vaidagdhī śrutiṣu sa punaḥ sarvaśāstrāvagāhas
śyāmā varṇe vacasi madhurā cañcalā dṛgvilāse
vāmotsaṅge lasati karuṇā kāpi kāmaṃ duhānā
bhūyo gacchan janapadamimaṃ sa tvamullaṅghya colān
prāptāśleṣaḥ stana iva nave korake kāmacārī
bhoktāsi tvaṃ kamapi samayaṃ tatra mākandavallīḥ
madhye yasyā marataka iva prekṣyate raṅganāthaḥ
kūjāṃ kiñcit kuru nanu girā vyajyate sannasaṃśca
kṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṭaḥ pathi pathi sakhe keralīnāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ
teṣāmeṣāṃ stutiṣu na bhavet kasya vaktraṃ pavitram
svairālāpaistava pika girāṃ kāpi śikṣā bhavitrī
sampadgrāmaṃ yadi na bhajase janmanā kiṃ bhṛtena
kṛtsnaṃ vyāpya sphurasi bhuvanaṃ mṛgyase cāgamāntaiḥ
seviṣyante niśi parabhṛta tvāṃ sukhena prasuptam
prasthātuṃ tvaṃ punarapi sakhe prakramethāḥ prabhāte
dūraṃ prāpte mayi vidhivaśāddūyamānāṃ sakhīṃ te
smāraṃ smāraṃ dviguṇagamanotsāha eva dhruvaṃ syāḥ
yugme yugme sa khalu viharan viśvavīro manobhūḥ
kṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭiṃ kathamapi tataḥ kautukānāṃ nidānād
dṛṣṭvā dūre sakṛdapi janā yanna paśyantyavaśyaṃ
pārśve yasya pravahati nilā nāma kallolinī sā
pāyaṃ pāyaṃ mukhaparimalaṃ mohanaṃ yatra mattāḥ
bhūyāt prītyai laghu ca samaye sevanaṃ hi prabhūṇām
īṣṭe teṣāṃ stutiṣu na guruḥ kā kathālpīyasāṃ no
ālāpo vā yadi saha budhairākṣipedasya cetaḥ
kokūyethāḥ sa khalu madhurāṃ sūktimākarṇya tuṣyet
dhīmān paśyet sa yadi nanu te śuddha eva pracāraḥ
mūrtidvandvaṃ vahati bhagavān yaḥ sa muktyai niṣevyaḥ
sampanmūrtiṃ praṇama girijāṃ sā hi viśvasya mātā
manye lokaiḥ kṣaṇamiva pṛthaṅno vibhāviṣyase tvam
kālīvāsaṃ bhaja pathi mahat kānanaṃ yatra śaśvat
sā ca prekṣyā saridanupadaṃ yatra kalmāṣitāyāṃ
tīraṃ tasyāḥ prati gatavato dakṣiṇaṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ te
tāṃ jānīyā diśi diśi jayantākhyayā khyāyamānāṃ
vaktraupamyaṃ vahati vimalaṃ paśya pārśve sudhāṃśoḥ
dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ kiṇamaṇikaṇaṃ hanta gāḍhaṃ prarūḍhaṃ
bhraśyannīvi sthitamiti viṭā vīkṣya saṃśliṣya yatra
na jñāyeran śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ cenna dadyuḥ
preyasyā me pariṇayamahaṃ prāpitau sādaraṃ yau
madhye tasyāṃ sa khalu latikāmaṇḍapo ratnabhūmiḥ
adhyāsīnā parijanakṛtāṃ sā na cedīkṣitā syāt
tasmin dṛśyā taṭidiva ghane cārurūpā priyā me
madhye 'nyāsāmapi caladṛśāṃ jñāsyase no kathaṃ tvam
cāndrī mūrtiḥ kathaya jagato jñāpyate kena rātrau
sā kāntiśceddravati kanakaṃ tanmukhaṃ cet ka induḥ
sā vā tasyā yadi tanulatā mālatī lohatulyā
aṅgeṣvasyā mama kathayato hanta vācāṃ pravṛttiḥ
tādṛgbhūte manasi vivaśe kinnu kurvīta seyaṃ
adya prāyaḥ praṇayini mayi proṣite bhāgyadoṣāt
pakṣmaspandaḥ samajani sakhe paśyatormāṃ yayoḥ prāṅ
sambhogānte muhurapi mayā sādaraṃ cumbito yaḥ
bhūṣāsvāsthāṃ yadapi jahatī tāṃ vahatyeva kāñcīṃ
grāhaṃ grāhaṃ pṛthu pṛthu mayā mauktikaṃ gumbhitā yā
sālāvītāṃ sa kila madano manyate rājadhānīm
ārabdhānāṃ hara hara mayā yatra saṃvāhanānāṃ
taptāṃ taptāṃ nayati nitarāṃ tānavaṃ jātavedā
śroṇyāṃ kṣaumaṃ malinamasṛṇaṃ sā vahatyeva hantety
daṣṭvā svairaṃ kisalayamatha prekṣaṇīyā tvayā sā
chinte tāpaṃ himajalamayī cāndanī kinnu carcā
mugdhā svasyāścaraṇapatitaṃ veti taṃ māṃ nirīkṣya
kenānītaḥ pura iti bhiyā vyāharantī sakhīrvā
nidrāṃ prāptā kathamapi cirāttatra cālokinī māṃ
sambhogānte svapanavidhaye yaḥ purā dhūyate sma
vakturvaktraṃ tamasi bhavato naiva dṛśyeta rātrāv
jātaṃ viddhi śrutisukhagirāṃ kokilānāṃ kule māṃ
coleṣvāste sumukhi kuśalī tvatpriyaḥ pṛcchati tvāṃ
evaṃ brūyāḥ punarajani yaḥ premakope mitho vāṃ
ātaṅkākhye sarasi luṭhato hā niśīthe niśīthe
bhātyunmādo bhramati matirityādi so 'haṃ na vedmi
bāṇaṃ muñcan parisaracaro na svapan nāpi khādan
kamrā vallyaḥ kimapi marutā cumbitā dakṣiṇena
smāraṃ smāraṃ kathamapi mayā muhyatā sahyate 'sau
tvatsaṃspṛṣṭe mama ca vapuṣi prema badhnāmi kānte
kālāt kṣīṇe punaravayave vardhate kevalaṃ no
evaṃprāyā na hi na virahe jīvituṃ santyupāyāḥ
tvaṃ ca snānādiṣu savayasāṃ prārthanāṃ mā niṣedhīḥ
snānānte te mukhamupasakhi prekṣamāṇe mayi drāg
pratyākhyātaḥ praṇayini ruṣā bimbito 'haṃ stane te
mā pāṭīraṃ pulakini punaścātra limpeti śaṃsaty
tvaṃ tu smṛtvā kimapi bahalavrīlamālokathā mām
so 'yaṃ bhedo viṣayabhidayā saṅgame tvaṃ kilaikā
viśleṣe tu tribhuvanamidaṃ jāyate tvanmayaṃ hi
śaṃsanti tvāṃ nanu parabhṛtaṃ śaiśave yadbhṛto 'nyaiḥ
